detaileddescription.para: Accepted false values (case-insensitive): "0", "false", "no", "off". Anything else that is set is treated as true.

memberdef.argsstring: (const char *name, int def, int min_v, int max_v)
memberdef.name: env_int_get

briefdescription.para: Read an integer env var with clamping.

memberdef.argsstring: (const char *name, size_t def, size_t min_v, size_t max_v)
memberdef.name: env_sizet_get

briefdescription.para: Read a size_t env var with clamping.
Initialize a NUMA policy snapshot from topology detection and env knobs.

simplesect.para: 0 on success, negative errno-like on failure.

briefdescription.para: Decide if a blob of bytes should be replicated per socket.

simplesect.para: true if replication should happen, false otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Compute the replica count to build under this policy.

detaileddescription.para:
This module:
detects sockets via ie_topology (if available),
detects NUMA nodes via sysfs (ie_numa_detect_nodes),
reads env knobs,
provides decisions used by the loader and hot replication code.
